response.original_title: My Chemical Romance: A Road Less Travelled
response.overview: This documentary film, charts the entire history of My Chemical Romance, from their earliest days spent playing to a local following, through the lads signing with a major label and taking their music and message to a global audience, and then following the group thereafter as they conquer the music-loving world and become the blueprint for a hundred tame copyists. The film gives the inside story of this extraordinary act through exclusive interviews, location shoots, previously unpublished photographs and footage, and a wealth of other material, which all at once makes for a fluid and focused insight into the past, present, and future of MCR. Also features EXTRAS such as a photo gallery, the MCR interactive challenge, and digital contributor biographies, plus a beyond DVD section for the true collector.
response.tagline: Formed in the wake of the 9/11 bombings, My Chemical Romance have gone on to become one of the finest and most successful rock acts of their generation.
response.title: My Chemical Romance: A Road Less Travelled
